data.description: Send HTML and Text embedded emails.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A module for sending HTML and Text embedded mime 1.0 compliant
    multipart/alternative emails.

    Easy to use object oriented interface, can send plain text, or
    plain text and html embedded emails.

    Allows for all the standard mail header parameters to be set, and
    let's the programmer define sendmail or an smtp server to send the
    email through.

    This module came about because of repeated requests from clients
    for the ability to send out html email newsletters to their
    subscription lists.
